detaileddescription.para: Control the unit action: getting a resource.
This the generic function for oil, gold, ...

simplesect.para: 1 if reached, -1 if unreacheable, 0 if on the way.
1 if reached, -1 if unreacheable, 0 if on the way.
1 if reached, -1 if unreacheable, 0 if on the way.

detaileddescription.para: Find something else to do when the resource is exhausted. This is called from GatherResource when the resource is empty.
Stop gathering from the resource, go home.
Wait in depot, for the resources stored.
Try to find another resource before give up
return false if failed, true otherwise.
return false if action is canceled, true otherwise.

briefdescription.para: how much time until we harvest some more.
Harvesting done, wait for action to break.
